mapper.select: SELECT identifier, location, bankHolidayDate, isValid, lastUpdatedBy FROM holidays WHERE location=#{location, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}
mapper.update: UPDATE holidays SET isValid = #{isValid}, location = #{location, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, lastUpdatedBy = #{lastUpdatedBy}, lastUpdated = now() WHERE identifier = #{identifier}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO holidays (bankHolidayDate, location, isValid, lastUpdatedBy, lastUpdated) VALUES(#{bankHolidayDate}, #{location, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{isValid}, #{lastUpdatedBy}, now() )
